document.full_text: blackouts hit most of venezuela on thursday, affecting an oil refinery and the caracas metro in a growing headache for president hugo chavez months after electricity rationing dented his popularity.
document.title: blackout hits most venezuelan states, caracas
lines_and_colors: blackouts hit most of venezuela on thursday, affecting an oil refinery and the caracas metro in a growing headache for president hugo chavez months after electricity rationing dented his popularity.
